TopicTitle: My first trip to a Munar Arch :D

Articles.Content: So, as I orbited the Mun I saw a weird looking crater. I only noticed after my ship was set to land on it. As I landed, I noticed a weird little thing. I had found a Mun Arch! Unfortunately, my ship crash-landed, but my rover pod was unharmed. So after a little work, I got the pod on the road. Attached are a few pics. (I'm beginning a program to set up a base there, and rescue my stranded comrades.)
did you go through it? any way good job! not many kerbals see that in there lifetime

did you go through it? any way good job! not many kerbals see that in there lifetime

I have Bill stationed there with Bob and Jeb back at the ship.

The rover is located under the arch, with Bill chilling out on top.

Fun fact: the cart mod as a "sticky" factor built in, to keep it from bouncing around over bumps. In fact, they're so sticky that you can drive on the underside of the arches:

I haven't tried it with the other model of cart, like yours, but why don't you give it a try? Quicksave first, of course.

Fun fact: the cart mod as a "sticky" factor built in, to keep it from bouncing around over bumps. In fact, they're so sticky that you can drive on the underside of the arches:

I haven't tried it with the other model of cart, like yours, but why don't you give it a try? Quicksave first, of course.

Holy crap. That is awesome.

Do you know if there are more arches?
There are 2 arches above ground, and for some reason, one underground that you can't reach. Those are all on Mun, and I don't think anyone has ever found one anywhere else.
I just found that arch today as well xD landed a base near it like you (are planning to, or already did)

I just found that arch today as well xD landed a base near it like you (are planning to, or already did)

I kept making designs, got lazy, then began my sundiving campaign. And Bill made it back with a little trust, but Jeb and Bob are still stranded.
